title: Supper Wagon
marks:
Title, Signature, Inscription and Seal

left mar LRC, in black: [ 遠志 ] {Tōshi}; LLC in bottom margi
description: three lighted carts with colored curtains in front of them with bold characters; figures standing behind curtains; dog in LRC; woman carrying a child on her back, LLQ; nighttime scene
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
